Html: Modern UI is still lacking a great looking logo. Anyone up for the challenge?

Koen,

I make two tries. See on link: http://sdrv.ms/WWuVwp

Do you have some ideas or suggestions? I can do other tries if you wish.
Maybe we can use an icon from http://modernuiicons.com/ to create the logo.

Thanks.

Hi,

Just made this simple logo:
http://i.imgur.com/V9gWFmP.png

Hope you like it.
Nice! Thank you both. I like NoobiCake's approach. How about removing the modern ui text to make it even simpler? Took the liberty to modify it.
I like NoobiCake's approach as well, though your variation is even better. Is it the same font family (segoe ui) as used in modern ui itself?

Cool, I'm glad you like it :)

It's not Segoe UI, it's Calibri Regular. I tried the Segoe UI font now, and that looks pretty good imo.

Link to PSD: http://dl.ptfo.org/gfx/ModernUI/
Wide Segoq UI looks pretty cool (imho). Could you please provide some color variants - background as well as foreground. Though I like our choice, I'd also like to see some alternatives...
Sure, I can make some alternatives.. After I've finished some stuff.
The Segoe UI variant is now the official logo!
